name: Mr. Loading Bar
description:
Challenged by some dude over internet.

He said that he would not be compelled to play a game where you play as loading bar.

I decided to prove him wrong! 

Edit: i didnt expected so many ppl playing this so sorry for fixed resolution

Music used:

Getting it Done Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
